entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
